title: Delilah Dusticle's Transylvanian Adventure
description: Alternate-cover edition can be found hereDelilah Dusticle is back with an action packed mission. In this illustrated instalment, Delilah and the Dustbusters are invited to Transylvania, to cater for the Hallow Eve Ball. All is not what it seems and Count Dracula has a very unusual request. Get ready to join the fun and experience the magic! This book entices the reader into a new and magical world that appeals to both kids and adults. The reader can explore how the ordinary in life can be extraordinarily overlooked, how friendship can help you overcome lifeâ€™s difficulties and how accepting yourself is the biggest challenge of all.Reading these stories is a truly magical and uplifting experience that should not be missed. Read it today!
author: A.J. York
